001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
009
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;
012
013/**
014 * A {@link Regime} decorator that repeats training for a fixed number of epochs.
015 *
016 * <p>This regime wraps another regime and delegates training to it multiple times.
017 * Each call to {@link #train} will invoke the delegate regime exactly
018 * {@link #getEpochs()} times over the same dataset. This is useful for
019 * composing training behaviors where you want to control how many epochs of
020 * training are performed independently of other concerns (batching, reporting,
021 * early stopping, etc.).</p>
022 *
023 * <h3>Notes</h3>
024 * <ul>
025 *   <li>The number of epochs must be at least 1.</li>
026 *   <li>This regime is typically used in a {@link net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime}
027 *   together with other decorators.</li>
028 * </ul>
029 *
030 * @see DelegatedRegime
031 */
032@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
033public final class EpochRegime extends DelegatedRegime implements EpochConfigurable {
034
035    @FunctionalInterface
036    public interface EpochCompletionListener {
037
038        <N extends Number> void epochCompleted(EpochRegime epochRegime, int currentEpoch, TrainableFunction<N> model, DataSet<N> trainingSet, Optimizer<? extends TrainableFunction<N>, N> optimizer);
039
040    }
041
042    public static EpochCompletionListener sample(int times, EpochCompletionListener listener) {
043        return new EpochCompletionListener() {
044            @Override
045            public <N extends Number> void epochCompleted(EpochRegime epochRegime, int currentEpoch, TrainableFunction<N> model, DataSet<N> trainingSet, Optimizer<? extends TrainableFunction<N>, N> optimizer) {
046                boolean call;
047                int totalEpochs = epochRegime.getEpochs();
048                if (totalEpochs < times || totalEpochs == currentEpoch || currentEpoch == 1) {
049                    call = true;
050                } else {
051                    call = (currentEpoch % (totalEpochs / times)) == 0;
052                }
053                if (call) {
054                    listener.epochCompleted(epochRegime, currentEpoch, model, trainingSet, optimizer);
055                }
056            }
057        };
058    }
059
060    private final List<EpochCompletionListener> listeners = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
061
062    /**
063     * Registers an epoch completion listener.
064     *
065     * @param listener the listener to add
066     */
067    public void addEpochCompletionListener(EpochCompletionListener listener) {
068        listeners.add(listener);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Removes an epoch completion listener.
073     *
074     * @param listener the listener to remove
075     */
076    public void removeEpochCompletionListener(EpochCompletionListener listener) {
077        listeners.remove(listener);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Creates a new {@code EpochRegime} that delegates to the given regime
082     * and repeats training for the specified number of epochs.
083     *
084     * @param regime the underlying regime to delegate training to
085     * @param epochs the number of epochs to run (must be {@code >= 1})
086     */
087    public EpochRegime(Regime regime, int epochs) {
088        super(regime);
089        setHyperparameter(HP_EPOCHS, epochs);
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Trains the given estimation function by repeatedly delegating to the
094     * wrapped regime for the configured number of epochs.
095     *
096     * @param estimationFunction the model to train
097     * @param trainingSet        the dataset to train on
098     * @param objective          the loss function to evaluate
099     * @param optimizer          the optimizer to apply parameter updates
100     * @param <E>                the type of estimation function
101     */
102    @Override
103    public <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer) {
104        for (int i = 1; i <= getEpochs(); i++) {
105            regime.train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer, i);
106            for (EpochCompletionListener listener : listeners) {
107                listener.epochCompleted(this, i, estimationFunction, trainingSet, optimizer);
108            }
109        }
110    }
111
112    @Override
113    public <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer, int step) {
114        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
115    }
116
117}
